nasa: NASA (National Aeronautics and Space Administration) is the U.S. space agency responsible for space exploration and scientific discoveries.

solar system: â˜€ï¸ Our solar system consists of the Sun, eight planets, moons, asteroids, and comets, all held together by gravity.

space-time: â³ Space-time is the four-dimensional fabric of the universe, combining space and time into a single continuum.
